root.name: Raiden IV
root.description: OverviewRaiden IV is a vertical scrolling shooter in the Raiden series, released for the Xbox 360 and arcades in 2009. The game was developed by MOSS and published by UFO Interactive. Raiden IV, like other games in the same franchise, is a bullet hell shooter, where the player must dodge countless bullets from oncoming enemies while defeating increasingly over-the-top bosses and foes.
